类 Geometry

java.lang.Object
Geometry
public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
This program demonstrates static methods

    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    (专用程序包) static void printMenu()
    Print the main menu Calling this to get a menu printed to stdout

    Calculate area of rectangle

    Calculate area of triangle

      w - width
      返回:

      static double triangleArea​(double b, double h)
      Calculate area of triangle
      参数:
      b - base
      h - height
      返回:
      area

      Calculate circumference of circle
      参数:

      返回:

      static double rectanglePerimeter​(double l, double w)
      Calculate perimeter of rectangle
      参数:
      l - length
      w - width
      返回:
      perimeter

    • trianglePerimeter

      static double trianglePerimeter​(double a, double b, double c)
      Calculate perimeter of triangle
      参数:
      a - side A
      b - side B
      c - side C
      返回:
      perimeter
